location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 379: Lieutenant-Colonel Samuel Hennell, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to Commodore John Patterson Porter, Commander of the Indian Naval Squadron in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: Samuel Hennell requests that his enclosed letters (not included) be taken to the Island of Kenn [Qeys] and delivered to Sheik Moobaruck ben Abdoollah, Humood ben Mahomed and Ally ben Sultan. The letters warn against the dispatch of an expedition against [Bahrein] Bahrain.
